mapper.select:
select pcxflfbm,pcxflfmc,pcxflbm,pcxflmc,sum(nvl(wts,0)) wts from ( select FFLXTDM pcxflfbm,mcf pcxflfmc,flxtdm pcxflbm,mc pcxflmc,nvl(wts,0) wts from ( SELECT x.FFLXTDM,dms.mc mcf,x.flxtdm,dmf.mc, SUM(CASE WHEN x.pcfs = '1' AND x.pcjg = '1' THEN 1 WHEN x.pcfs = '2' AND x.pcjg IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) wts from yx_pc_pcx x left join v_pcajxx jb on jb.pcslbm = x.pcslbm left join XT_PC_DM dmf on x.flxtdm = dmf.dm left join XT_PC_DM dms on x.FFLXTDM = dms.dm
GROUP BY x.FFLXTDM,dms.mc,x.flxtdm,dmf.mc order by x.FFLXTDM,x.flxtdm ) union all select FFLXTDM pcxflfbm,mcf pcxflfmc,flxtdm pcxflbm,mc pcxflmc,nvl(wts,0) wts from ( SELECT x.FFLXTDM,dms.mc mcf,x.flxtdm,dmf.mc, SUM(CASE WHEN x.pcfs = '1' AND x.pcjg = '1' THEN 1 WHEN x.pcfs = '2' AND x.pcjg IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) wts from yx_pc_offline_pcx x left join v_pcjb jb on jb.pcslbm = x.pcslbm left join XT_PC_DM dmf on x.flxtdm = dmf.dm left join XT_PC_DM dms on x.FFLXTDM = dms.dm
GROUP BY x.FFLXTDM,dms.mc,x.flxtdm,dmf.mc order by x.FFLXTDM,x.flxtdm ) ) GROUP BY pcxflfbm,pcxflfmc,pcxflbm,pcxflmc order by pcxflfbm,pcxflbm
